summary: Vladxn's Morag Tong Questline adds a whole new faction to the game - the Morag Tong from Morrowind -
descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Georgia][size=3]
"The afore-mentioned personage has been marked for honorable execution in accordance to the lawful tradition and practice of the Morag Tong Guild. The Bearer of this non-disputable document has official sanctioned license to kill the afore-mentioned personage."[/size][/font][/i][font=Georgia][i][size=3]

[/size][/i][/font][img]http://www.uesp.net/w/images/a/ac/MW-book-Moragtong.png[/img]
[size=6]
[/size]          
[color=#b6b6b6][size=4]VERSION 3.4
Scripted Quests and more
READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION !!! (Except the "Questline")                                    
(All Ashfallow Citadel radiant quests are safe! + Original/Clean/Untouched Hrodulf's House)[/size][/color]
[size=4][color=#900000]Thanks To "darkgondul" For Contributing To The Mod[/color]
[/size][color=#999999]                            
[/color]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i]Features :[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Arial]
-A quest in order to join
[size=2]-The Morag Tong guild
-The Morag Tong guildhall
-A bed and a container for the player
-Two Morag Tong follower
-An enchanted ring
[/size][/font]-An enchanted clothing outfit
-Friendly Morag Tong assassins
-An enchanted set of Morag Tong armor
-Mephala's daedric artifact (The Ring Of The Khajiiti)
-Lots of fat loot (Including some Dark Brotherhood loot)
-19 quests
-3 new sets of armor
-1 new weapon (Bow)
-2 Sanguine items

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[font=Georgia][size=3][i][b]How To Play The Mod / Tips N Tricks :[/b][/i][/size][/font]

[size=3][b][font=Georgia][color=#b6b6b6]Joining[/color][/font][color=#999999] [/color][/b][/size]- In order to join, you will have to kill the curious Redoran Guard trying to enter the Guildhall.
[b]
[size=4][font=Georgia][color=#b6b6b6]Location[/color][/font][color=#999999] [/color][/size][/b]- The Guildhall is located inside the Ashfallow Citadel.[b]
[/b]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][color=#b6b6b6]Quests[/color][color=#999999] [/color][/b][/size][/font]- To start a quest, speak to Grandmaster Vendil Severin and select the option "What is my next contract, Grandmaster Vendil Severin?" You will get a "Writ Of Execution" and will have to assassinate the target(s). After the target(s) have been assassinated, you will ask him for a new contract.

[b][font=Georgia][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]Tips N Tricks (Before starting the questline)[/size][/color][/font] [/b]-Do not kill the below mentioned citizens of Raven Rock / Do not kill the below mentioned citizen of the Skaal Village / You may not start "The Whispering Door" quest, but it will not break anything at all if you do

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i]
Requirements :
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
-Dragonborn DLC
-A new save game is not required, but encouraged. If you've already killed one of the targets, the whole questline is unplayable

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i]Bugs :[/i][/b][/size][/font]

-On really rare occasions, all CUSTOM NPCs might just disappear (RELOAD A SAVE / NO FIX)
-The vanilla quests regarding the destruction of the Morag Tong have been removed (this causes no bugs, if only minor ones)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i]Questline - EXAGGERATEDLY [/i][i]MAJOR SPOILER ALERT -[/i][/b]
[/size][/font][color=#b6b6b6]
[b][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Public Writs[/i][/size][/font][/b]
[/color]
1-Writ Of Execution: Garyn Lenth - 100 Gold

2-Writ Of Execution:  Hrodulf's Assassins (Adds a new Bandit in the basement) - 100 Gold

3-Writ Of Execution: Slitter - 100 Gold

4-Writ Of Execution: Galdrus Hlervu - 100 Gold

5-Writ Of Execution: Finna - 100 Gold


[color=#b6b6b6][font=Georgia][size=4][b][i]Skyrim Writs[/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]

6-Writ Of Execution : Rolff Stone-Fist - 150 Gold / Bow of Balmora / Balmora Blue


[color=#b6b6b6][font=Georgia][size=4][b][i]Personal Writs[/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]

7-Writ Of Execution: Morag Tong traitor - 300 Gold / Poisoner's Cuirass / Sanguine Siren Hood

8-Writ Of Execution: Traitor's sick mother - 300 Gold

9-Kill a Morag Tong member in the Bulwark Jail and drop his body in the tunnels beneath it - 300 Gold / Boots of the Mammoth / Illusionist's Gauntlets

10-Ambush an Imperial ship, crashed off the shores of Solstheim, and murder the Dark Brotherhood prisoner inside it - 400 gold


[color=#b6b6b6][font=Georgia][size=4][b][i]Guildwar Writs[/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]

10-Writ Of Execution: Talvas Fathryon - 200 Gold

[font=Arial]11-Writ Of Execution: [/font][font=Times New Roman][size=2]Captain Modyn Veleth - Murder the guard captain, thus disorganising the House Redoran Guards - 250 Gold[/size][/font]

12-Writ Of Execution: Three House Redoran Guards - 600 Gold

13-Writ Of Execution: Cindiri Arano - Fake her suicide and steal the key to the Councilor's bedroom from her corpse - 250 Gold

14-Writ Of Execution: Adril Arano - Assassinate him while he is wandering the docks and steal the Councilor's schedule. Drop his body into the waters - 250 Gold / Band of the Webspinner

15-Writ Of Execution: Murder the Councilor's personal bodyguard and steal their armor, impersonating them

16-Writ Of Execution: Lleril Morvayn, the Councilor - 4000 Gold / Sanguine Raiment


[b][i][font=Georgia][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]Mephala Writs[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b]

17-Recover two Sanguine Items

18-Recover the Ring Of The Khajiiti, the Daedric Artifact of Mephala

(19)-Recover the "Ebony Blade"


[color=#b6b6b6][font=Georgia][size=4][i][b]"Kill the Grandmaster" Writ[/b][/i][/size][/font][/color]

20-Honorable Writ Of Execution: Grandmaster Vendil Severin (Optional) - Grandmaster Writs / Morag Tong Grandmaster Armor

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[font=Georgia][b][i][size=5]By Vladxn[/size][/i][/b][/font]
author: Vladxn
